nodes.excerpt: Compose private notes, optionally share them with others and still stay in control of who can access your data. All while having an excellent offline-first experience on all platforms.

nodes.title: NoCode Tutorials - Free database of NoCode tutorials

nodes.excerpt: Discover the power of Walling and kickstart your next project with the new Walling templates. No complex workflows. No wasted hours setting up random templates that don't work. With Walling, it is simple, just put it on a wall! Start a new wall: https://wall.new

nodes.excerpt: The data management App that gives users ownership and control of their data - Collect your data from multiple platforms - View your data in an intuitive dashboard - Choose who can access your data and who can't
nodes.title: Rita Personal Data - Collect, view and control your data

nodes.excerpt: Porter is a platform that makes AWS/GCP as easy to use as Heroku. With instant deploys from Git, built-in autoscaling, and automatic SSL, Porter gives you the convenience of a PaaS while preserving flexibility and control.
nodes.title: Porter - Heroku that runs in your own cloud
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Don't keep your audience waiting for a follow-up email! Sharing slides or resources has never been easier. Upload your content, add your custom QR code to any presentation and streamline sharing. ****Currently free for all early access users****
nodes.title: Slideshare - Share presentations and resources, easily
nodes.author: James Quinn

nodes.excerpt: Think of Speeko like a gym membership for your voice. Get instant feedback on your speaking style, and track your progress over time. Personalized activities help you build new skills in just 5 minutes a day. You'll be speaking with confidence in no time!
nodes.title: Speeko - A.I. powered public speaking and presenter coach
nodes.author: Nico Aguilar

nodes.excerpt: Bitclout is a social network built on a blockchain where all users have a creator's coin and where everyone can buy and sell those coins using bitclout crypto-currency
nodes.title: BitClout - A crypto social network
nodes.author: Ouriel Ohayon

nodes.excerpt: We are a company that helps entrepreneurs and SMEs outsource their work. Visit www.GetCallers.com to find out how businesses can leverage our agents for as low as $5/hour to generate leads for them, set appointments, remote admin tasks, and much more.
nodes.title: Get Callers - Appointment setting and calling for $5/hour
nodes.author: Mark Suleman

nodes.excerpt: Implementing a great email program is the most effective way to grow your business. Discover 60+ growth tactics to increase your email ROI based on the strategic goals you want to achieve, such as: improving deliverability, increasing open rates, and more.
nodes.title: Email Growth Playbook - Increase your email ROI with 60+ growth tactics
nodes.author: Julie Paci

nodes.excerpt: Collecting binding e-signatures is a hassle. Etch e-sign free simplifies this process to three easy steps: upload a PDF, choose up to two signers, and send a signature request for free. Signers can review and sign documents from anywhere on any device.
nodes.title: Etch E-Sign Free - Simple, intuitive and binding e-signatures, absolutely free
nodes.author: Mang-Git Ng

nodes.excerpt: Engineering time is valuable, and securing your application flows can be challenging and time consuming. With OTPfy you can secure any part of your application with ease without wasting any more time and resources.
nodes.title: OTPfy - Secure your apps with magic links and one time passwords
nodes.author: Alex Casillas

nodes.excerpt: Spaceman is an application for macOS that allows you to view your Spaces in the menu bar. Spaceman allows you to see which space you are currently on relative to the other spaces you have. Naming these spaces is also an option.
nodes.title: Spaceman - A macOS app to view virtual desktops in the menu bar
nodes.author: Jay

nodes.excerpt: Bambuserâ€™s Live Video Shopping technology drives customer engagement and sales for some of the worldâ€™s largest brands and retailers. Bambuser is now the platform of choice for companies seeking deeper connection with customers across digital platforms.

nodes.excerpt: Distributed is a new live social chat app to help remote teams stay in sync. It started off as a jamstack demo but after spending 2-3 hours on it every day we realised it filled a huge hole in our work life as we all went remote.
nodes.title: Distributed - Stay in sync with friends, family and colleagues
nodes.author: Asim Aslam

nodes.excerpt: A pack of 55 High-quality Illustrations & Animations. Simply drag and drop these illustrations & animations to supercharge your project in seconds! We've created illustrations for e-commerce, marketing, SaaS and Education. I've included an exclusive 50% OFF.
nodes.title: 55 Animated Adventure Illustrations - High-quality SVG Illustrations and Lottie animations
